ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have brought maidens into being
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have formed them in a distinctive fashion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and their spouses We shall have brought them into being afresh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We have indeed developed these women with an excellent development.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have created them a special creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have made them to grow into a (new) growth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We have created them a (new) creation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We have created those maidens by a creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We have created them with a special creation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have created (their Companions) of special creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We have created them (maidens) of special creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed We formed them (the houris and all believing women),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have created them of special creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:35] Verily We have created them with an [unmediated] creation, namely, the wide-eyed houris, [We created them] without the process of birth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We have created them a (new) creation) We created the females of the life of the world; We created them again after they went through impotence, lack of vision, sickness and death.
